Question: Ningbo Cinemount Design and Manufacturing Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ningbo Cinemount Design and Manufacturing Co., Ltd CES 2024

- Leading manufacturer of home theater accessories
- Specializes in mounts and brackets for flat panel televisions
- Offers a wide range of original designs and accepts OEM and contract work
- Employs over 200 workers and can produce more than 2.5 million mounts annually
